articles.description:
Re 目前 Sentiment 还约有近 1 百万美元资产，其曾在 2022 年 9 月完成了 Archetype Ventures 和 Maxtriport Ventures 等投资的 240 万美元融资，但于今年 4 月因只读可重入性被攻击损失 1 百万美元。https://twitter.com/sentimentxyz/status/1689729483270447104?s=20

Sentiment: After thoughtful consideration, it has been decided that Sentiment V1 will sunset on Friday, August 22nd
Key things to note:
1. Sentiment V2 is currently being developed (more news on this soon)
2. Users will be able to withdraw even after support for the UI is deprecated

articles.author: Surfer
articles.description:
RT Rob Henderson
In terms of effect on happiness...
-Being in good physical health is worth an extra $400K/year
-Being married=$100K  
-Seeing a friend regularly=$100K
How nice that cultural and economic elites promote fitness, marriage, & friendship. They clearly want you to be happy.
articles.title: RT Rob Henderson: In terms of effect on happiness... -Being in good physical health is worth an extra $400K/year -Being married=$100K -Seeing a friend...
